parameters.name: fit_flag
parameters.description: This flag denotes the fit quality and encodes any contingencies in the ion VDF analysis (10=SW parameters OK)

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: ---> year

parameters.name: doy
parameters.description: ---> Fractional day of year of start of spectrum (Noon on January 1 = 1.5)

parameters.name: Proton_V_nonlin
parameters.description: Proton bulk speed

parameters.name: Proton_V_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: --> Proton bulk speed (w/ uncertainties)

parameters.name: Proton_sigmaV_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty of the proton bulk speed

parameters.name: Proton_VR_nonlin
parameters.description: R_RTN component of the proton vector velocity [km/s], from non-linear analysis

parameters.name: Proton_VR_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> R_RTN component (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Proton_sigmaVR_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty of measured R_RTN

parameters.name: Proton_VT_nonlin
parameters.description: T_RTN component of the proton vector velocity [km/s], from non-linear analysis

parameters.name: Proton_VT_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> T_RTN component (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Proton_sigmaVT_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty of measured T_RTN

parameters.name: Proton_VN_nonlin
parameters.description: N_RTN component of the proton vector velocity [km/s], from non-linear analysis

parameters.name: Proton_VN_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> N_RTN (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Proton_sigmaVN_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty of measured N_RTN

parameters.name: Proton_W_nonlin
parameters.description: Scalar [isotropic] proton thermal speed [km/s], from the trace of the anisotropic temperatures.

parameters.name: Proton_W_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Scalar [isotropic] proton thermal speed (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Proton_sigmaW_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in the proton trace thermal speed [km/s].

parameters.name: Proton_Wperp_nonlin
parameters.description: Proton thermal speed perpendicular to the magnetic field direction [km/s].

parameters.name: Proton_Wperp_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Proton thermal speed perpendicular (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Proton_sigmaWperp_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in the perpendicular proton thermal speed [km/s].

parameters.name: Proton_Wpar_nonlin
parameters.description: Proton thermal speed parallel to the magnetic field direction [km/s].

parameters.name: Proton_Wpar_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Proton thermal speed (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Proton_sigmaWpar_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in the parallel proton thermal speed [km/s].

parameters.name: EW_flowangle
parameters.description: East-West RTN bulk Flow Angle [degrees]

parameters.name: EW_flowangle_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> East-West RTN bulk Flow Angle (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: SigmaEW_flowangle
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in the east-west flow angle

parameters.name: NS_flowangle
parameters.description: North-south RTN bulk flow angle [degrees]

parameters.name: NS_flowangle_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> North-south RTN bulk flow angle (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: SigmaNS_flowangle
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in north-south flow angle

parameters.name: Proton_Np_nonlin
parameters.description: Proton number density Np (n/cc) from non-linear analysis (linear scale)

parameters.name: Proton_Np_nonlin_log
parameters.description: ---> Proton number density Np (log scale)

parameters.name: Proton_Np_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Proton number density Np (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Proton_sigmaNp_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in the proton density

parameters.name: Alpha_V_nonlin
parameters.description: Alpha bulk speed V (km/s) from non-linear analysis

parameters.name: Alpha_V_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Alpha bulk speed V (km/s) (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Alpha_sigmaV_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in alpha V [km/s]

parameters.name: Alpha_VR_nonlin
parameters.description: Alpha velocity component Vr (RTN, km/s) from non-linear analysis

parameters.name: Alpha_VR_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Alpha velocity component Vr (with uncertainties

parameters.name: Alpha_sigmaVR_nonlin
parameters.description: --->1-sigma uncertainty in alpha Vr [km/s]

parameters.name: Alpha_VT_nonlin
parameters.description: Alpha velocity component Vt (RTN, km/s) from non-linear analysis

parameters.name: Alpha_VT_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Alpha velocity component Vt (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Alpha_sigmaVT_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in alpha Vt [km/s]

parameters.name: Alpha_VN_nonlin
parameters.description: Alpha velocity component Vn (RTN, km/s) from non-linear analysis

parameters.name: Alpha_VN_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Alpha velocity component Vn (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Alpha_sigmaVN_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in alpha Vn [km/s]

parameters.name: Alpha_W_nonlin
parameters.description: Scalar [isotropic] alpha particle thermal speed [km/s].

parameters.name: Alpha_W_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Scalar [isotropic] alpha particle thermal speed [km/s] (with uncertainties).

parameters.name: Alpha_sigmaW_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in trace thermal speed [km/s].

parameters.name: Alpha_Wperp_nonlin
parameters.description: Alpha particle thermal speed perpendicular to the magnetic field direction [km/s].

parameters.name: Alpha_Wperp_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Alpha particle thermal speed perpendicular to the magnetic field direction [km/s] (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Alpha_sigmaWperp_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in the perpendicular alpha thermal speed [km/s].

parameters.name: Alpha_Wpar_nonlin
parameters.description: Alpha particle thermal speed parallel to the magnetic field direction [km/s]

parameters.name: Alpha_Wpar_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Alpha particle thermal speed parallel (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Alpha_sigmaWpar_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in the perpendicular alpha thermal speed [km/s].

parameters.name: Alpha_Na_nonlin
parameters.description: Alpha number density Na (n/cc) from non-linear analysis

parameters.name: Alpha_Na_nonlin_log
parameters.description: ---> Alpha number density Na (log scale)

parameters.name: Alpha_Na_nonlin_errorbars
parameters.description: ---> Alpha number density Na (with uncertainties)

parameters.name: Alpha_sigmaNa_nonlin
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in the alpha density [n/cc]

parameters.name: ChisQ_DOF_nonlin
parameters.description: Reduced chi-squared for this fit

parameters.name: Peak_doy
parameters.description: ---> Time that the peak charge flux was observed for each spectrum (in fractional day of year)

parameters.name: sigmaPeak_doy
parameters.description: ---> 1-sigma uncertainty in time of peak flux (in fractional day of year)

parameters.name: Proton_V_moment
parameters.description: Proton bulk speed (km/s) from moment analysis

parameters.name: Proton_VR_moment
parameters.description: Proton velocity component Vr (RTN, km/s) from moment analysis

parameters.name: Proton_VT_moment
parameters.description: Proton velocity component Vt (RTN, km/s) from moment analysis

parameters.name: Proton_VN_moment
parameters.description: Proton velocity component Vn (RTN, km/s) from moment analysis

parameters.name: Proton_W_moment
parameters.description: Proton thermal speed W (km/s) from isotropic moment analysis

parameters.name: Proton_Wperp_moment
parameters.description: Proton thermal speed Wperpendicular (km/s) from bimax moment analysis

parameters.name: Proton_Wpar_moment
parameters.description: Proton thermal speed Wparallel (km/s) from bimax moment analysis

parameters.name: Proton_Np_moment
parameters.description: Proton number density Np (n/cc) from moment analysis

parameters.name: Proton_Np_moment_log
parameters.description: ---> Proton number density Np (n/cc) from moment analysis (log scale)

parameters.name: BR
parameters.description: Magnetic field component Br (RTN, nT) averaged over plasma measurement

parameters.name: BT
parameters.description: Magnetic field component Bt (RTN, nT) averaged over plasma measurement

parameters.name: BN
parameters.description: Magnetic field component Bn (RTN, nT) averaged over plasma measurement

parameters.name: Ang_dev
parameters.description: Angluar deviation of magnetic field over plasma measurement [degrees]

parameters.name: dev
parameters.description: Deviation in magnitude of field over plasma measurement [nT]

parameters.name: xgse
parameters.description: X (GSE) Position of Wind S/C at start of spectrum [Re]

parameters.name: ygse
parameters.description: Y (GSE) Position of Wind S/C at start of spectrum [Re]

parameters.name: zgse
parameters.description: Z (GSE) Position of Wind S/C at start of spectrum [Re]
